page.title: 14HOUSES
page.content: In the village of Mount there are{36 houses. The old school house and pub are now converted houses. The house I live in was built in 2 stages. Part of it is 3OO years old. The rest 5O years old. Some of the walls are very thick, they are made of Cob. There are l6 bungalows in Mount. Most of them were built of{stone and granite. Wendy's family lives in 'Milland', Cardinham near old Treveddoe tin mine. The cottage is 35O years old and made of granite and stone. It has 4 rooms and a dairy. Inside it still has beams with meat hooks hanging from them. Outside the cottage are orchards and an old cider press.
